reference.title: ID attribute group
reference.shortdesc: The ID attribute group includes attributes that enable the naming and referencing of elements in topics and maps.

dlentry.dd: id attribute (common)Attributesid (common)An anchor point. This ID is the target for references by href and conref attributes and for external applications that refer to DITA content. This attribute is defined with the XML data type NMTOKEN, except where noted for specific elements within the language reference. See in the Architectural Specification for more details.
conref attributeAttributesconrefThis attribute is used to reference an ID on content that can be reused. See for examples and details about the syntax.
conrefend attributeAttributesconrefendThe conrefend attribute is used when reusing a range of elements through conref. The syntax is the same as for the conref attribute; see for examples.

conaction attributeAttributesconactionThis attribute enables users to push content into a new location. Allowable values are mark, pushafter, pushbefore, pushreplace, and -dita-use-conref-target. See for examples and details about the syntax.

conkeyref attributeAttributesconkeyrefAllows the conref feature to operate using a key instead of a URI.
See for more details about the syntax and behaviors.
